Description: About the Company:qusah stores is a leading tissues and cleaning supplies company that specializes in E-commerce . We are looking for a Digital Marketing Manager who will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing our digital marketing campaigns.Job Description:As a Digital Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for:- Developing and executing digital marketing strategies that drive website traffic, increase leads, and improve customer engagement.- Managing and optimizing all digital marketing channels, including email, social media, search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC), and display advertising.- Conducting market research and analyzing customer data to identify trends and opportunities for growth.- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop and execute integrated marketing campaigns.- Tracking and analyzing website traffic using Google Analytics and providing regular reports on performance.- Implementing conversion rate optimization strategies and conducting A/B testing to improve website performance.- Managing marketing automation and CRM systems to improve lead generation and customer retention.- Developing and executing content marketing strategies that align with overall marketing goals.- Staying up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends and technologies.Skills
Skills: If you are passionate about digital marketing and have a proven track record of driving results, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your cover letter and resume for consideration.
- Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field.
- 5+ years of experience in digital marketing, with the last experience being in a digital-based business (e-commerce, online services, or digital-marketing agency).
- Proven track record of developing and executing successful digital marketing campaigns.
- Strong knowledge of digital marketing channels, including SEO, PPC, email, and social media advertising.
- Experience with Google Analytics, marketing automation, and CRM systems.
- Excellent communication and project management skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
